nodes.text: General Quarters was located aboard Omze's Incredible Traveling Starport. Run by the Bith steward Brobius, visitors to Omze's could rent passenger cabins for private use. The suites were pricey but well-appointed, and room service was available. The cabins had been renovated and refitted with luxury appointments and were soundproofed to insulate the clients from the noises of the ship.
However, Platt Okeefe had heard rumors that Humans renting the cabins were known to have mysteriously disappeared.
